description:
Tessa decides to take some time off and goes to Sousuke`s school for two weeks. Unfortunately, between work and homework, Sousuke’s feeling pretty stressed out.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Goddess Comes to Japan (Part 1: The Suffering)
L`arrivo in Giappone della dea (capitolo della sofferenza)
Uma Deusa Chega Ao Japão! (Parte 1: O Sofrimento!)
Une déesse arrive au Japon (partie 1) : La souffrance
